page.title: 11SCHOOLBOY LEISURE INTERESTS
page.content:
My name is Leighton Keenan and I live
Temple Gardens Carmarthen Dyfed
My interests are:_ Playing some sports especially athletics. I like running, high jump and long jump. In the nights I watch T.V. or play video games. On average I watch about four hours of T.V. each night. A video game is a thing which you plug into a T.V. and pictures come on the screen. I do not enjoy playing them because I get bored after a while. This is a list of things people do in their spare time in our class:_ Bike, Rugby,Football,T.V.,Video,Read,Comput_ er,Drawing,Shopping,Walking,Park,Visit _ing,Helping parents,Swimming,Listen_ ing to music,Roller skates,Sleeping.
